dialogue: Hey, you seen my phone anywhere? I can't find it no how.
No, I didn't see it. Did you leave it at your work?
Nah, I don't think so. I was using it at home last night, but now it's just gone. Poof!
Maybe you forget it in the kitchen or somewhere. You checked everywhere good?
Yeah, I checked all the rooms, even under the couch. I think it got legs and walked away!
Ha! That would be some crazy stuff. Did you tried calling it?
Yeah, but it’s on silent mode, so that ain’t helping none. And now I feel like I'm losing my mind.
Don't worries, we gonna find it. Let’s retrace your steps. You remember what was you doing last?
Umm, I was watching TV, then I went to the bathroom, and after that I was in the kitchen for a snack. That’s when I thinked I last had it.
Okay, so let’s start from the kitchen. Maybe it’s in the fridge with your snack! You do that before, remember?
Oh, yeah! I’m always putting stuff in weird places. Let’s go check.
Alright, let’s go find that sneaky phone!
So, we checked the kitchen, and still no phone. What we do now?
Hmm, maybe it’s in the bathroom? You sayed you went there, right?
Yeah, but I already looked there twice. Ain't nothin' in there.
Okay, then think again. Did you went outside for a moment? Maybe it’s on the porch or something.
Oh! I did go to take out the trash last night. But why would my phone be in the trash?
You never know! I seen you do some pretty strange things when you tired.
Haha, true that. Let’s go check outside just in case.
Alright, but hurry up. I don’t wanna be searching out here all day!
Okay, okay… I’m looking now… Nope, no phone in the trash.
Well, that’s good news, I guess. So, what we do next?
I don’t know… Maybe I call the phone company and tell them to block it or something?
Wait! Did you check your car? Sometimes you leave it in there by mistake.
Oh, man! You right! I totally forgot about the car. Let’s go check there!
Alright, so we checked the car and guess what? No phone there either!
Seriously? How you losing stuff like that all the time? It’s like your superpower or something.
I know, right? If there was an award for losing things, I’d be the champ!
For real. Okay, let’s think… maybe it fell between the couch cushions. You know how things disappear in there.
Yeah, but I swear I checked there already. But fine, let’s go check again.
Alright, I’ll help. Start pullin' the cushions out. You never know what you find!
Whoa, look at this! I found my old earring I lost months ago! And some crumbs… a lot of crumbs.
Ugh, gross. But no phone, huh?
Nope, no phone. Just a whole mess of stuff I don't even wanna know about.
Man, this is getting frustrating. Did you checked the backyard? Maybe you left it outside when you was out with the dog?
Oh! I totally forgot I took the dog out! Let’s go check the backyard real quick.
Yeah, hurry up. I hope it didn’t rain on your phone if it’s out there!
I know, right? I’ll cry if that happen. Okay, I’m lookin'… Oh no… I see something shiny over there by the flowers.
What is it? Your phone?
No… it’s just a piece of foil. Ugh, why is this so hard?!
Because you always losin’ stuff, that’s why. Wait… did you check your jacket pockets?
No, I didn’t think of that! I was wearing my jacket last night… Hold on… let me check…
Please let it be there… Please, please, please…
Oh my gosh, I found it! It was in my pocket the whole time!
Seriously?! After all that, it was in your pocket? I’m gonna lose my mind.
I know, I’m sorry! I swear I’m not usually this forgetful…
Not usually? You sure about that?
Okay, okay, maybe a little. But thanks for helpin' me look. You’re a good friend.
Yeah, yeah, just buy me some lunch, and we call it even.
Deal! Let’s go get some food. I’m starvin’ after all that searching!
Me too. And maybe next time, try not to lose your brain along with your phone, okay?
Haha, I’ll try my best. No promises though!
So, now that we found my phone, where we gonna eat?
I’m thinkin’ about that new burger place down the street. Heard they got some good stuff.
Oh, yeah! I heard about that place too. They got those huge milkshakes with all the crazy toppings, right?
Yep! I seen pictures online, and they look insane. Like, they put whole donuts on top of them!
Whoa, that sounds awesome! But also… kinda unhealthy. Maybe we should eat something lighter?
Come on, after all that stress lookin' for your phone, we deserve a treat! Plus, you owe me lunch, remember?
Alright, alright, you got a point. Let’s do it. I’m cravin’ a big, messy burger now!
That’s the spirit! Let’s head over there before the lunchtime crowd shows up.
Good idea. But first, let me grab my wallet… Oh no, don’t tell me I lost that too!
No way… You serious right now?
Haha, just kidding! Got it right here in my back pocket. I ain’t that forgetful!
Phew, you almost gave me a heart attack! I swear, you like to live on the edge.
Life’s too short to be boring, right?
Yeah, but not so short you gotta lose everything every day! Come on, let’s go before you lose your keys or something.
Good call! Let’s get outta here… wait, do you hear that?
Hear what? I don’t hear nothin’. You trippin’ again?
No, seriously, listen… It’s like a buzzing sound. Oh no, my phone is ringing now!
Haha, oh great! After all that, now someone wanna call you.
Yeah, I bet it’s some spam call. Wait, lemme check… Yep, knew it. ‘Congratulations, you won a free cruise.’
Spam calls are the worst. But at least your phone works fine, right?
Yeah, true. All this panic for nothin’. But hey, at least I got a good workout from running around the house.
Yeah, and I got a good laugh watchin' you freak out. Totally worth it.
Glad I could entertain you. Alright, for real this time, let’s go get those burgers!
Finally! Let’s get outta here before anything else goes missing.
Don’t jinx it! But yeah, let’s roll. And thanks again for helping me find my phone. You’re the best.
No problem. That’s what friends are for, right? Helping each other out and laughing when things go crazy.
Exactly! Alright, let’s go get those giant milkshakes and make this day even crazier.
Deal! And no more losing things today, okay?
I promise! At least until tomorrow!
Haha, fair enough. Let’s go!
